adjectives.description: considerate (comparative more considerate, superlative most considerate)

entries.meaning: Consciously thoughtful and observant (often of other people and their rights, needs, feelings and comfort).
examples: It was very considerate of you to give up your place for your friend.

entries.meaning: Characterised by careful and conscious thought.

verbs.description: considerate (third-person singular simple present considerates, present participle considerating, simple past and past participle considerated)
